page: CY61019: Special Topics In Main Group Chemistry

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text:
Prerequisite : NilStructure and Bonding in MG compounds and Multiple Bond. Recent advances in the coordination, cluster chemistry of MG. C-C bond forming reactions via chemistry of MG.
MAIN GROUP CHEMISTRY
including Hypervalency organometallic, and MG. Bioinorganic
